Package inf101.chess.model

Class ChessBoard

java.lang.Object
inf101.chess.model.ChessBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
IChessBoard
public class ChessBoard extends Object implements IChessBoard
A class for a ChessBoard which will hold pieces.

    • initializeBoard

      public void initializeBoard()
      Description copied from interface: IChessBoard
      Initializes a standard chess board. That is, it sets up 8 pawns for each side, 2 bishops, rooks, and knights and a single queen and king.
      Specified by:
      initializeBoard in interface IChessBoard
